Articles.Content:
Hi all, John here.

My cousin turned me onto this game a week ago and it\'s had a crack like effect on me. After an hour of playing I immediately bought it. I\'ve been playing 4-5 hours a day. I used mechjeb at first to kind of learn how to get into orbit and lunar transfer and whatnot. Learning to do it manually has been pretty rewarding. Now I can now launch into orbit and transfer to either of the moons fairly regularly with manual control.

That\'s about it. Just wanted to say hey. Seems like a great community.

And thanks to Squad for this amazing program.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Welcome to the forums! Nice to see you\'ve had a positive first-experience.
